definition: the act of applying force to propel something, impose urgently, importunately, or inexorably
details:
noun
- the act of applying force to propel something
= synonyms: drive
- a sharp hand gesture (resembling a blow)
= synonyms: jab, poke, jabbing, poking, thrusting
- a strong blow with a knife or other sharp pointed instrument
= synonyms: stab
- verbal criticism
= example: verbal criticism
- the force used in pushing
= synonyms: push
verb
- impose urgently, importunately, or inexorably
= synonyms: force
- penetrate or cut through with a sharp instrument
= synonyms: pierce
- place or put with great energy
= synonyms: throw
- push forcefully
= example: push forcefully
- make a thrusting forward movement
= synonyms: hurl
- press or force
= synonyms: shove, squeeze, stuff
- push upward
= example: push upward
= synonyms: push up, push up, boost up
- force (molten rock) into pre-existing rock
